languages.text: "Передайте им: утверждение истинно. Ересь истреблена, и причин проливать кровь больше нет".
"Tell them the statement is true. The heresy has been exterminated and there is no more reason for bloodshed."
languages.original_text: "Передайте им: утверждение истинно. Ересь истреблена, и причин проливать кровь больше нет".

traits.locale_text: "Tell them the statement is true. The heresy has been exterminated and there is no more reason for bloodshed."
"Tell them the statement is true. The heresy has been exterminated and there is no more reason for bloodshed."
"Tell them the statement is true. The heresy has been exterminated and there is no more reason for bloodshed."
"Tell them the statement is true. The heresy has been exterminated and there is no more reason for bloodshed."
"Tell them the statement is true. The heresy has been exterminated and there is no more reason for bloodshed."

languages.text: “告诉他们，这种说法是真的。异端邪说已经被彻底消灭，已经没有继续流血的理由了。”
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. The heresy has been exterminated and there is no more reason for bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: “告诉他们，这种说法是真的。异端邪说已经被彻底消灭，已经没有继续流血的理由了。”

languages.text: « Dites-leur que cette affirmation est vraie. L'hérésie a été exterminée et le sang n'a plus de raison de couler. »
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. The heresy has been exterminated and there is no more reason for bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: « Dites-leur que cette affirmation est vraie. L'hérésie a été exterminée et le sang n'a plus de raison de couler. »

languages.text: «Dígales que es verdad. Se ha puesto fin a la herejía y ya no hay razón para derramar más sangre».
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. The heresy has been exterminated and there is no more reason for bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: «Dígales que es verdad. Se ha puesto fin a la herejía y ya no hay razón para derramar más sangre».

languages.text: 「その発言は真実だと伝えろ。異端は殲滅され、流血が起きる理由はもうない」
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. The heresy has been exterminated and there is no more reason for bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: 「その発言は真実だと伝えろ。異端は殲滅され、流血が起きる理由はもうない」

languages.text: "Sagt ihnen, dass die Aussage stimmt. Die Ketzerei wurde ausgelöscht und es gibt keinen Grund mehr, weiteres Blut zu vergießen."
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. The heresy has been exterminated and there is no more reason for bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: "Sagt ihnen, dass die Aussage stimmt. Die Ketzerei wurde ausgelöscht und es gibt keinen Grund mehr, weiteres Blut zu vergießen."

languages.text: "Şu söylediklerimi ilet: Doğru. Kâfirliğin kökü kurutuldu, kan akıtmak için artık bir sebep yok."
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. The heresy has been exterminated and there is no more reason for bloodshed."
